name: platform-sfdx-deploy
description: An application that will deploy an SFDX project from a public Github repo

CONSUMERKEY.description: The consumer key for your Connected App.

HUB_USERNAME.description: The username for your connected app

JWTKEY.description: The server.key file from your connected app

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Get from account settings in the UI (https://dashboard.heroku.com/account)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: name of your heroku app...used for review apps and one-off dyno creation

GITHUB_REPO_WHITELIST.description: Optional comma-list of username/repo to always allow

GITHUB_USERNAME_WHITELIST.description: Optional comma-list of username to always allow
